testcase.name: Get satellite position for valid satellite id - Happy Path #1
testcase.classname: This feature tests the whereistheiss public APIs
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Get satellite position for valid satellite id - Happy Path # src/test/resources/bdd/wheretheissapi.feature:15 When I get the satellite position for satellite "25544" for below # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.i_get_the_satellite_position_for_satellite_for_below(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | timestamps | 1436029892 | | units | miles | Then the response status code should be 200 # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.the_response_status_code_should_be(int) And the response body should be have satellite position # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.the_response_body_should_be_have_satellite_position()
testcase.system-err: log4j:WARN No such property [datePattern] in org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender.

testcase.name: Validations for get satellite position by Id #1
testcase.classname: This feature tests the whereistheiss public APIs
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Validations for get satellite position by Id # src/test/resources/bdd/wheretheissapi.feature:28 When I get the satellite position for satellite "123" for below # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.i_get_the_satellite_position_for_satellite_for_below(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | timestamps | 1436029892 | | units | [empty] | Then the response status code should be 404 # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.the_response_status_code_should_be(int) And the error message should be "satellite not found" # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.theErrorShouldBe(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Validations for get satellite position by Id #2
testcase.classname: This feature tests the whereistheiss public APIs
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Validations for get satellite position by Id # src/test/resources/bdd/wheretheissapi.feature:29 When I get the satellite position for satellite "25544" for below # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.i_get_the_satellite_position_for_satellite_for_below(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | timestamps | [empty] | | units | miles | Then the response status code should be 400 # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.the_response_status_code_should_be(int) And the error message should be "invalid timestamp in list:" # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.theErrorShouldBe(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Get TLE data for a satellite in JSON and Text format #1
testcase.classname: This feature tests the whereistheiss public APIs
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Get TLE data for a satellite in JSON and Text format # src/test/resources/bdd/wheretheissapi.feature:38 When I get TLE data in "" format for a given satellite "25544" # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.iGetTLEDataInFormatForAGivenSatellite(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the response status code should be 200 # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.the_response_status_code_should_be(int) And the response body should have TLE data for given satellite # org.truelayer.challenge.stepDefinition.WhereTheIssApi.theResponseBodyShouldHaveTLEDataForGivenSatellite()
